mapper.select: select ui.username, proimgrev.productId, proimgrev.productname, proimgrev.productprice, proimgrev.productimage, proimgrev.pattachtype, proimgrev.pattachoname, proimgrev.reviewTitle, proimgrev.reviewContent, proimgrev.userid, proimgrev.reviewid from userinfo ui inner join (select proimg.productId, proimg.productname, proimg.productprice, proimg.productimage, proimg.pattachtype, proimg.pattachoname, revi.reviewTitle, revi.reviewContent, revi.userid, proimg.reviewid from review revi inner join (select abc.productId, abc.productname, abc.productprice, img.productimage, img.pattachtype, img.usage, img.pattachoname, abc.reviewid from productImages img inner join (select pr.* , a.reviewid from product pr inner join (Select Distinct P.Productid, (Select Count(*) From Review R Where R.Productid = P.Productid) As Reviewcount, (Select Reviewid From Review Rev Where Rev.Productid = P.Productid Order By Rev.Ratingscore Desc Fetch First 1 Rows Only) As Reviewid From Product P Inner Join Productimages Th On Th.Productid = P.Productid And Th.Usage = 'thumbnail' Left Join Review R On R.Productid = P.Productid Order By Reviewcount Desc Fetch First 3 Rows Only) a on pr.productid = a.productid) abc on img.productId = abc.productId And img.Usage = 'thumbnail') proimg on revi.productid = proimg.productid and revi.reviewid = proimg.reviewid) proimgrev on ui.userid = proimgrev.userid
